array where third velocity components of react2 will be stored.

memberdef.argsstring: (sim_offload_data *sim, int reaction, int n, afsi_data *react1, afsi_data *react2, real mult, dist_5D_offload_data *prod1_offload_data, dist_5D_offload_data *prod2_offload_data, real *prod1_offload_array, real *prod2_offload_array)
memberdef.name: afsi_run

briefdescription.para: Calculate fusion source from two arbitrary ion distributions.

detaileddescription.para: Possible fusion reactions are listed below in a format reactant 1 + reactant 2 -> product1 + product2:
1: D + T -> He4 + n 2: D + He3 -> He4 + p 3: D + D -> T + p 4: D + D -> He3 + n
Inputs and outputs are expected to have same physical (R, phi, z) dimensions.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to simulation offload data
fusion reaction type, see the description
number of Monte Carlo samples to be used
reactant 1 distribution data
reactant 2 distribution data
factor by which the output is scaled
distribution data for product 1 output
distribution data for product 2 output
array where product 1 distribution is stored
array where product 2 distribution is stored
distribution to be tested.
